subject: Re: [junit] your opinion needed: package for unit testing codes
msgSnippet: ... Sometimes yes; sometimes no. Mostly no, but I think yes . -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
Charles Hayes wrote:

> I would tend to agree with Veny. We wouldn't want the test code to ship
> with the production distribution, right?

Sometimes yes; sometimes no. Mostly no, but I think "yes".
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
